answers.answer: I prayed for your headache to go away!!!
Call your doctor and ask what you can take
Tylenol is on the approved medication list
If Tylenol doesn't work, you need to have your blood pressure check. High blood pressure can cause a headache.

definitely call your doctor because headaches can be from high blood pressure or preeclampsia. all u can really do for now istake tylenol lay in the pitch black with a cold rag oon your head. good luck mama

I've had the same headache started yesterday it didn't budge not even with Tylenol till I had a cup of coffeeif you need to check your blood pressure remember that Walmart has a blood pressure machine
Go see a chiropractor. ...I did with both of my pregnancies.  It can help better that Tylenol most of the time....I hope it gets better.

question: I have a severe headache that's so bad it's making me cry.  Please anyone help what can I do.  I couldn't even sleep last night
title: help me
